xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="nY~wr/bG}gm)3H%td6xM" x="63" y="-12">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="sheet_init" id="2CR-Wf2ApU}YZ|_h%Kgo">
        <value name="sheetUrl">
          <block type="text" id="T~V2yaLc#P^Be}GTr/:f">
            <field name="TEXT">https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ClUkSY6zCbOGS8FGk1Q5wopeycv-4A2N6L3tljPFLqQ/edit#gid=0</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="sheetName">
          <block type="text" id="ZIsxh,UpgTi-JBBoLf[2">
            <field name="TEXT">工作表1</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="get_weather" id="vBoPb;RBcY5r0;#NGdfB">
            <field name="type_">aqi</field>
            <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">取得氣象資料之後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
            <next>
              <block type="controls_repeat_ext_can_stop" id="tiNW)5Z/Ujymnh@+42h-">
                <field name="async">FALSE</field>
                <value name="times_">
                  <block type="math_number" id="qZcx6_L%E]B#W,qAWM6l">
                    <field name="NUM">10</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="sheet_write_easy" id="_:4:OWRv|r39OFiPg?KK">
                    <mutation items="4"></mutation>
                    <field name="type">last</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">試算表寫入資料之後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="data_0">
                      <block type="getdate" id="7@kZaM`-u(Y~=2kPPs]^">
                        <field name="date_">ymd</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="data_1">
                      <block type="gettime" id="u1N{aH(6.3JNU7Ys[?i}">
                        <field name="time_">hms</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="data_2">
                      <block type="bit_temp_val" id="l%~fwQ?NGVWXBjm,42Up"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="data_3">
                      <block type="get_weather_aqi" id="~b]Bmz_pUxYqRu8EVqTk">
                        <field name="location">中山</field>
                        <field name="type">PM25</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="controls_if" id="9yzLHfqB`_ub).u*VjzI">
                        <value name="IF0">
                          <block type="logic_compare" id="6~|8#A/L?t99M~fKXT3i">
                            <field name="OP">GT</field>
                            <value name="A">
                              <block type="bit_temp_val" id="/in_Lr-~@iNj!=(4q_Y)"></block>
                            </value>
                            <value name="B">
                              <block type="math_number" id="0t|E|,TKl9lSRA7PnqX7">
                                <field name="NUM">25.08</field>
                              </block>
                            </value>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                        <statement name="DO0">
                          <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="jKma/(mD@5^8q/`zzR;p">
                            <field name="music_">m1</field>
                          </block>
                        </statement>
                        <next>
                          <block type="delay" id="`st~6DQF=#(oo4L#k:ll">
                            <value name="secs_">
                              <block type="math_number" id="h14I6f:aotJ+IGRpug:C">
                                <field name="NUM">1</field>
                              </block>
                            </value>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="bit_button_event" id="f*%@(VK@;k6hB^w-.z%`" x="437" y="1192">
    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
    <statement name="do_">
      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id=")h;]RXu_/Z[=6tnO!f}H">
        <field name="music_">m4</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
